ComicInfo.Title: Still-Life Slut
ComicInfo.Summary:
Rebecca takes us to a new neighborhood with a whole batch of new beautiful hornier-than-thou housewives. Audrey is a soccer mom who doesn’t think her “angel” is being treated properly by her teacher. A blackmail romp ensues when Audrey threatens to “expose” the bad teacher to the school board. This is not your mother’s PTA!
Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-03-31 13:03:40. [CVDB172567]
